languages.text: "Омниссия знает все, постигает все. Благодарю, технобрат Оптикон-22".
"The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. Thank you, Tech-Brother Opticon-22."
languages.original_text: "Омниссия знает все, постигает все. Благодарю, технобрат Оптикон-22".

traits.locale_text: "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. Thank you, Tech-Brother Opticon-22."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. Thank you, Tech-Brother Opticon-22."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「万機神はすべてを知り、すべてを包む。あなたに感謝します、技術同胞オプティコン-22」
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. Thank you, Tech-Brother Opticon-22."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神はすべてを知り、すべてを包む。あなたに感謝します、技術同胞オプティコン-22」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓。谢谢你，技术兄弟奥普蒂孔22号。”
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. Thank you, Tech-Brother Opticon-22."

traits.locale_text: “欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓。谢谢你，技术兄弟奥普蒂孔22号。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Der Omnissiah weiß alles, begreift alles. Danke, Tech-Bruder Opticon-22."
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. Thank you, Tech-Brother Opticon-22."

traits.locale_text: "Der Omnissiah weiß alles, begreift alles. Danke, Tech-Bruder Opticon-22."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout. Merci, technofrère Opticon-22. »
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. Thank you, Tech-Brother Opticon-22."

traits.locale_text: « L'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout. Merci, technofrère Opticon-22. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo. Gracias, tecnohermano Opticon-22».
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. Thank you, Tech-Brother Opticon-22."

traits.locale_text: «El Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo. Gracias, tecnohermano Opticon-22».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hermesih her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır. Teşekkür ederim Tekno Kardeş Opticon-22."
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. Thank you, Tech-Brother Opticon-22."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır. Teşekkür ederim Tekno Kardeş Opticon-22."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
